title: New Product Development Project-Based Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Engineering/Design Concepts and Statistical Analysis Competency
context.additional_context: Creative Problem-Solving Education Focused on Sustainable Product Development Using Mathematical Modeling

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model and explain the five stages of a new product development process (idea generation–market analysis–prototyping–testing–launch).
Learners can apply product lifecycle assessment (LCA) using mathematical methods when designing sustainable products through project-based learning.
Learners can complete prototype development and presentation materials within one week using team-based collaboration tools (Miro, Figma) and LMS systems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
